ftbquests.chapter.chapter_iii_the_cooper: Chapter II: The Valve Machine[--第二章:阀门机器--]
&6Sap&r is an important component to make an essential item for your automations! [--&6胶带&r是制作自动化基本物品的一个重要组件!--]

To gather &6Sap&r you need to use an Item Drain made with a Iron Fence and a Valve Machine to extract the &6Sap&r from Wood Logs. To put the &6Sap&r into a Bucket you need to use a Spout and an Empty Bucket.[--要收集&6树苗&r,你需要使用用铁栅栏和阀门机器制作的物品排液来从原木中提取&6树苗&r。要将&6树苗&r放入桶中,你需要使用喷液和空桶。--]
With all that Sap you’ve gathered, it’s time to mix it up with a Mechanical Mixer and a Basin to create Raw Rubber! [--有了你收集的所有树脂,是时候用动力搅拌机和盆子来制作生橡胶了!--]

&d&oTrivia:&r&r &oTires used to be white because natural rubber is white. Natural rubber was not ideal for tires, they were fortified with zinc oxide, another white material. Later they replaced the zinc oxide with a superior material called Carbon Black giving the tires they're black color. This is why Michelin Man is white, representing the very first tires.&r[--&d&oTrivia:&r&r&oTrees过去是白色的,因为自然橡胶是白色的。自然橡胶不是轮胎的首选,它们用氧化锌作为堡垒,另一个白色材料。之后,它们用一种叫碳黑的更高级材料替换了氧化锌,给它染上黑色的轮胎。这就是为什么米其林人是白色的,代表了第一个轮胎。&r--]
Now it’s time to strengthen your Rubber and no, you don’t need to use Carbon Black to do so. In this case, you just have to heat it up! [--现在是时候强化你的橡胶了,不,你不需要使用黑碳来这样做了。在这样的情况下,你只需要加热它!--]
Belts[--腰带--]
Time to turn your Rubber into one of the most useful items in Create, the &6Mechanical Belt!&r [--是时候把你的橡胶变成创造中最有用的物品之一了,&6机械腰带!&r--]

&6The Mechanical Belt&r has many uses, such as moving items to point A to B, or to use it to add rotation to machines. It can even be used for Aesthetic purposes.[--&6动力腰带&r有多种用途,例如将物品移动到A到B,或使用它为机器添加旋转力.甚至可用于美学目的.--]
&6&lTip:&r&r &oYou can use dyes in your Mechanical Belt to add colors or use Andesite Block to add some frames to it.&r[--&6&l提p:&r&r &o你可以在动力腰带中使用染料添加颜色或使用安山岩块添加一些框架.&r--]
Copper Ore[--铜矿石--]
The Copper Ore is the key of this chapter. Grab your Pickaxe and go mine some Copper and then turn them into Copper Ingots.[--铜矿石是该章节的关键。抓住你的镐来挖一些铜,然后把它们变成铜锭。--]
For an infinite source of Copper, please check &aRenewable Ores chapter&r.[--对于无限的铜源,请查看&a可更新的矿石章节&r.--]
&o&dTrivia:&r&r &oNearly 80 percent of the copper that has been mined to date is still in use.&r[--&o&dTrivia:&r&o几乎有80%的铜在使用中.&r--]
With all that Copper Ingots in your hands, it’s time to set things flat! [--有了所有的铜锭,是时候把东西放平了!--]
To turn the Copper Ingots into Sheets, you need to craft a &6Mechanical Press.&r[--要将铜锭变成薄板,你需要制作一个&6机械冲压机.&r--]
Still have some Copper Ingots left? No? Go grab some more and create Winry! By that I mean the Wrench. [--还需要一些铜锭吗?不?去多拿点来创造Winery!--]
&cThe Wrench&r by itself can be used to rotate blocks and to make a Deployer use the Wrench,&n you have to use a Chute to Hop the Wrench in&r.[--&c扳手&r可以自己旋转方块和让机械手使用扳手,&n你必须使用溜槽来跳过扳手&r.--]
&o&dNote:&r&r &oIf you recognize the name Winry, you Rock like a Bell!&r[--&o&dNote:&r&r&o如果你认得这个名字,你就像钟一样石头!&r--]
So if you haven’t built yourself a &eSand&r Castle yet… use that &eSand&r and turn it into&a Glass&r by heating it up.[--所以如果你还没有建造一个&e沙子&r城堡...使用&e沙子&r通过加热它来将其变成&a玻璃&r.--]
&d&oTrivia:&r&r &oGlass is 100% recyclable!  So if you break your Glass, make sure to recycle it!&r[--&d&oTrivia:&r&r&o玻璃可以100%回收!所以如果你破坏你的玻璃,确保回收!&r--]
Sand[--沙子--]
Grab yourself a shovel or use your hands and go dig some &esand&r like a pirate to make Glass! [--给自己拿一把锹或用手来挖一些&esand&r来制作玻璃!--]

&o&dTrivia:&r&r &oDeserts aren't the world's largest sandboxes, Minecraft is! No seriously, deserts aren’t the largest, the world's largest sand deposits are actually found on the ocean floor. &r[--&o&dTrivia:&r&r &o沙漠不是世界上最大的沙子箱, Minecraft is!--]
With all your knowledge and hard work combined, you’ve achieved the ultimate goal of&c Chapter 2!&r The creation of the&2 Valve Machine! &r[--&c第2章!&r 创建&2阀门机器!&r--]
You should pat yourself in the back, you deserve it. [--你应该在背面拍拍自己,你值得的。--]
&6Now into Chapter 3!&r New challenges await you there![--&6现在进入第3章!&r新的挑战等待着你!--]
The heart of all Copper Machines! You can craft the&6 Valve Mechanism&r by using Deployers, a Mechanical Press and a Rotational Mechanism. [--所有铜制机器的核心!你可以通过使用机械手、动力冲压机和旋转机械来制作&6阀门&r.--]

The first Deployer assembles Copper Sheets into the Rotational Mechanism, then the second Deployer assembles the Glass, then the last Deployer Uses the Wrench to make sure everything is tight and finally the Mechanical Press does the final touch and you have made the &6Valve Mechanism!&r[--第一个机械手将铜板放入旋转机制,然后第二个机械手装入玻璃,然后最后一个机械手使用扳手确保所有东西都很紧,最后动力冲压机做最后的触摸,你已经制作了&6阀门机制!&r--]
